title: Harry's Cafe
typeOfFood: Indian, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Basic take away place in the Oriental Plaza shopping mall. A large section of the menu is dedicated to vegetarian meat substitutes - ask which is vegan. Try the burgers and soya chip hot dog. Food is spicy but you could request to omit masala.
